text: "Darkness" is a maxi-single from American hard rock band Aerosmith and taken during the recording sessions of their eighth studio album Done with Mirrors. It did not appear at all on the vinyl copy but appeared on the CD and cassette versions. ==Track listing== *12" vinyl: #"Darkness" – 3:42 #"She's on Fire (Live)" – 6:02 #"The Hop (Live)" – 5:40 #"My Fist Your Face (Live)" – 4:30 All live tracks recorded at Worcester, Massachusetts on March 12, 1986. == References == Category:1986 songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Aerosmith songs
title: Darkness (Aerosmith song)
